segments.text: I peek into the kitchen and see the woman drying a plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely focused on it, not noticing anything else around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing right behind her, water pouring out like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that puddle spreading on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in it, but she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, over to the side, there's a boy on a stool reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high, grabbing those cookies with a grin I can imagine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And his sister is right there, hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sneaky little operation they're pulling off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how the kids are causing chaos while mom is oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
